name: A New World - BPJ Entry
description:
After getting beamed down from who-knows-where, the alien Xyglob must explore a new planet with no memories!

An exploration through deep, subterranean caves filled with lava, through a land of snowstorms, and even a region where it is always night, A New World is an adventure through a fun land!

CONTROLS (Since I didn't have time for a tutorial or anything)

Movement: Use the A key and D key to move left and right, respectively

Jumping: There is no jumping in this game! Get near a wall and you'll recieve a massive boost upwards, provided by your handy-dandy hovercraft!

Interacting: Press E to talk to the denizens of this world, ranging from sarcastic signs to perpetually propitious plants!

Music: Crossedkiller

Everything else: Lucky Clover Dev (me)
